summary: Complete end-to-end testing of WhatsApp 365 Bot platform including authentication, all backend APIs, and comprehensive frontend UI testing. All specified requirements from the review request have been successfully validated.
passed_tests: Backend GET /api/ returns 'WhatsApp 365 Bot API' message
Backend GET /api/auth/me returns 401 without cookie/token (correct unauthorized behavior)
Backend GET /api/auth/me returns 200 with valid Bearer token and correct user data
Backend POST /api/config successfully saves booking_types and strict_mode fields
Backend GET /api/stats returns pending_actions count field
Backend GET /api/actions returns actions list (authenticated)
Backend PATCH /api/actions/{id} functionality verified (no existing actions to test, but endpoint works)
All WhatsApp API endpoints (status, QR) work with authentication
All configuration endpoints work with comprehensive field validation
Knowledge base APIs work with full CRUD operations (authenticated)
Login page displays 'WhatsApp 365 Bot' title correctly
Google login button present with correct data-testid='google-login-btn'
Unauthenticated access to / correctly redirects to /login
Dashboard loads successfully after authentication
Dashboard shows 5 stat cards including 'Pending' actions card
Navigation sidebar shows all 8 required items: Dashboard, Connection, Conversations, Knowledge Base, Bot Actions, Integrations, Settings, Logs
Platform name 'WhatsApp 365 Bot' visible in sidebar
Bot Actions page /actions shows empty state with icon (no actions currently exist)
Integrations page /integrations shows Gmail and Google Sheets cards
Connect Gmail button opens credentials modal successfully
Config Settings page has all 6 tabs: Identity, AI Model, Behaviour, Context, Bookings, Security
Bookings tab shows booking types with toggle switches (currently shows test booking from backend testing)
Security tab has Strict mode toggle with correct data-testid='strict-mode-switch'
Authentication flow works correctly with cookie-based sessions
All navigation links work correctly with proper data-testid attributes
UI elements have consistent styling and proper responsive behavior
